original_title: light is the first bodily form
overview: Light is the first bodily form pays homage to the philosopher of light, Robert Grosseteste. The title is intended to be somewhat tongue-in-cheek since this video was made entirely in the dark, using only a circuit bent Webcam. No additional computer effects were added to the video. The music is the song “Rain Serenade” by Natural Snow Buildings.
tagline: ... all that sense can comprehend, is Light: because it partaktes of that which it is.
title: light is the first bodily form
